\begin{tikzpicture}

\definecolor{darkgray176}{RGB}{176,176,176}
\definecolor{steelblue31119180}{RGB}{31,119,180}

\begin{axis}[
tick align=outside,
tick pos=left,
x grid style={darkgray176},
xmin=-0.05, xmax=1.05,
xtick style={color=black},
y grid style={darkgray176},
ymin=-0.45, ymax=9.45,
ytick style={color=black}
]
\addplot [semithick, steelblue31119180, mark=o, mark size=3, mark options={solid,fill opacity=0}]
table {%
0 0
0.11111111 1
0.22222222 2
0.33333333 3
0.44444444 4
0.55555556 5
0.66666667 6
0.77777778 7
0.88888889 8
1 9
};
\end{axis}

\end{tikzpicture}
